languages.text: В начале боя участники сражения делятся на союзные и вражеские группы (от 2 до 4 участников), которые чередуются в трекере инициативы. Расчет инициативы определяет, в какой группе союзников (или врагов) окажется персонаж. Чем выше показатель инициативы персонажа, тем больше шансов у него попасть в группу в начале трекера инициативы и походить первым. Первой в бою будет {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходить{/g} та группа, чья средняя {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}инициатива{/g} (сумма всех инициатив, деленная на количество участников) была выше. Расчет инициативы: ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} + бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g} / 2 + (от 1 до 10))

At the start of each battle, all characters in combat are separated into allied and enemy groups with 2 to 4 characters in each. An allied group's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} alternates with an enemy group's turn. A character's {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} determines which group of allies or enemies they are assigned to. The higher a character's initiative, the higher the chances of being added to a group that is closer to the start of the initiative tracker, therefore allowing them to act first in combat. The first to act is the group whose average initiative (total initiative divided by the number of characters in the group) is the highest. Initiative is calculated using the following formula: ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus / 2 + (from 1 to 10))
languages.original_text:
В начале боя участники сражения делятся на союзные и вражеские группы (от 2 до 4 участников), которые чередуются в трекере инициативы. Расчет инициативы определяет, в какой группе союзников (или врагов) окажется персонаж. Чем выше показатель инициативы персонажа, тем больше шансов у него попасть в группу в начале трекера инициативы и походить первым. Первой в бою будет ходить та группа, чья средняя инициатива (сумма всех инициатив, деленная на количество участников) была выше.
Расчет инициативы: (бонус ЛВК + бонус ВОС / 2 + (от 1 до 10))

traits.locale_text:
At the start of each battle, all characters in combat are separated into allied and enemy groups with 2 to 4 characters in each. An allied group's turn alternates with an enemy group's turn. A character's initiative determines which group of allies or enemies they are assigned to. The higher a character's initiative, the higher are their chances of being added to a group that is closer to the start of the initiative tracker and therefore acting first in combat. The first to act is the group whose average initiative (total initiative divided by the number of characters in the group) is the highest.
Initiative is calculated using the following formula: (AGI bonus + PER bonus / 2 + (from 1 to 10))

At the start of each battle, all characters in combat are separated into allied and enemy groups with 2 to 4 characters in each. An allied group's turn alternates with an enemy group's turn. A character's initiative determines which group of allies or enemies they are assigned to. The higher a character's initiative, the higher are their chances of being added to a group that is closer to the start of the initiative tracker and therefore acting first in combat. The first to act is the group whose average initiative (total initiative divided by the number of characters in the group) is the highest.
Initiative is calculated using the following formula: (AGI bonus + PER bonus / 2 + (from 1 to 10))

Initiative is calculated using the following formula: (AGI bonus + PER bonus / 2 + (from 1 to 10))

languages.text: Zu Beginn jedes Kampfes werden alle beteiligten Charaktere in verbündete und feindliche Gruppen mit jeweils 2 bis 4 Charakteren aufgeteilt. Eine verbündete Gruppe ist abwechselnd mit einer feindlichen Gruppe am {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Die {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}Initiative{/g} eines Charakters bestimmt, welcher Gruppe von Verbündeten oder Feinden er zugewiesen wird. Je höher die Initiative eines Charakters, desto höher die Chance, zu einer Gruppe hinzugefügt zu werden, die näher am Anfang des Initiative-Trackers liegt und somit als erste im Kampf agieren kann. Die Gruppe, deren durchschnittliche Initiative (Gesamtinitiative geteilt durch die Anzahl der Charaktere in der Gruppe) am höchsten ist, ist zuerst dran. Die Initiative errechnet sich anhand der folgenden Formel: ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}-Bonus / 2 + (von 1 bis 10))
languages.original_text: At the start of each battle, all characters in combat are separated into allied and enemy groups with 2 to 4 characters in each. An allied group's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} alternates with an enemy group's turn. A character's {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} determines which group of allies or enemies they are assigned to. The higher a character's initiative, the higher the chances of being added to a group that is closer to the start of the initiative tracker, therefore allowing them to act first in combat. The first to act is the group whose average initiative (total initiative divided by the number of characters in the group) is the highest. Initiative is calculated using the following formula: ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus / 2 + (from 1 to 10))

traits.locale_text:
Zu Beginn eines Kampfes machen alle im Kampf befindlichen Charaktere einen Initiativewurf, um die Handlungsreihenfolge zu ermitteln
Die Initiative eines Charakters errechnet sich aus seinem{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeits{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}, der Hälfte seines {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmungs{/g}-Bonus und einem zufälligen Wert von 1 bis 10.
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}reihenfolgen werden zuerst getrennt für dich und deine Gruppenmitglieder und schließlich für Feinde ermittelt.
Dann werden diese beiden Reihenfolgen mithilfe eines der voreingestellten Algorithmen kombiniert.

languages.text: Au début de chaque bataille, tous les personnages qui y participent sont répartis en groupes alliés et ennemis composés chacun de 2 à 4 personnages et jouant leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} en alternance. L'affectation d'un personnage à un groupe d'alliés ou d'ennemis est déterminée par son {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g}. Plus l'initiative d'un personnage est élevée, plus il a de chances d'être affecté à un groupe proche du début de la jauge d'initiative, ce qui lui permet d'agir plus tôt en combat. Le premier groupe à agir est celui dont l'initiative moyenne (initiative totale divisée par le nombre de personnages dans le groupe) est la plus élevée. L'initiative est calculée selon la formule suivante : ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} + bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} / 2 + (de 1 à 10))
languages.original_text: At the start of each battle, all characters in combat are separated into allied and enemy groups with 2 to 4 characters in each. An allied group's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} alternates with an enemy group's turn. A character's {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} determines which group of allies or enemies they are assigned to. The higher a character's initiative, the higher the chances of being added to a group that is closer to the start of the initiative tracker, therefore allowing them to act first in combat. The first to act is the group whose average initiative (total initiative divided by the number of characters in the group) is the highest. Initiative is calculated using the following formula: ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus / 2 + (from 1 to 10))

traits.locale_text:
Au début de chaque bataille, tous les personnages participant au combat effectuent des jets d'initiative pour déterminer l'ordre dans lequel ils interviendront.
L'initiative est calculée en additionnant le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} du personnage, la moitié de son bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et un nombre entier aléatoire compris entre 1 et 10.
Dans un premier temps, l'ordre des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g} est déterminé séparément pour vous et les membres de votre groupe, puis pour les ennemis.
Ces deux ordres sont ensuite combinés à l'aide de l'un des algorithmes prédéfinis.

languages.text: 每场战斗开始时，战斗中的所有角色会被分成友军小组与敌军小组，每组包含2到4名角色。友军小组与敌军小组的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}会交替轮换，角色的{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}先攻{/g}值决定角色被分配的组别。角色的先攻值越高，在战斗中率先行动的几率就越高。最先行动的小组为平均先攻值（总先攻值除以该小组中的角色数量）最高的小组。 先攻值的计算方法如下：（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}加值/2+（1到10之间的随机数））
languages.original_text: At the start of each battle, all characters in combat are separated into allied and enemy groups with 2 to 4 characters in each. An allied group's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} alternates with an enemy group's turn. A character's {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} determines which group of allies or enemies they are assigned to. The higher a character's initiative, the higher the chances of being added to a group that is closer to the start of the initiative tracker, therefore allowing them to act first in combat. The first to act is the group whose average initiative (total initiative divided by the number of characters in the group) is the highest. Initiative is calculated using the following formula: ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus / 2 + (from 1 to 10))

traits.locale_text: 每场战斗开始时，战斗中的所有角色会被分成友军小组与敌军小组，每组包含2到4名角色。友军小组与敌军小组的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}会交替轮换，角色的{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}先攻{/g}值决定角色被分配的组别。角色的先攻值越高，在战斗中率先行动的几率就越高。最先行动的小组为平均先攻值（总先攻值除以该小组中的角色数量）最高的小组。 先攻值的计算方法如下：（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}加值/2+（1到10之间的随机数））

languages.text: Al principio de cada batalla todos los personajes del combate se dividen en grupos de aliados y enemigos, cada uno con entre 2 y 4 personajes. Los grupos se {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnan{/g} alternando entre un grupo de enemigos y uno de aliados. La {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}iniciativa{/g} de un personaje determina a qué grupo de aliados o enemigos se le asigna. Cuanto más alta es la iniciativa, más probabilidades tiene de acabar en la parte inicial del cuadro de iniciativa, actuando así en primer lugar durante el combate. El primer grupo en actuar es el grupo cuya iniciativa media (iniciativa total dividida por número de personajes del grupo) sea más alta. La iniciativa se calcula con esta fórmula: ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} + bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} / 2 + (de 1 a 10))
languages.original_text: At the start of each battle, all characters in combat are separated into allied and enemy groups with 2 to 4 characters in each. An allied group's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} alternates with an enemy group's turn. A character's {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} determines which group of allies or enemies they are assigned to. The higher a character's initiative, the higher the chances of being added to a group that is closer to the start of the initiative tracker, therefore allowing them to act first in combat. The first to act is the group whose average initiative (total initiative divided by the number of characters in the group) is the highest. Initiative is calculated using the following formula: ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus / 2 + (from 1 to 10))

traits.locale_text:
Al inicio de cada batalla, todos los personajes participantes realizan una tirada de iniciativa para determinar el orden de actuación.
La iniciativa se calcula mediante la suma de la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}agilidad{/g} del personaje, la mitad de su bonificación de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}percepción{/g} y un número entero al azar entre 1 y 10.
El orden de los {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g} se determina primero para los miembros de tu grupo y tú y, después, para los enemigos.
Una vez hecho esto, se combinan ambos órdenes por medio de los algoritmos preestablecidos.

languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, all participating characters make an initiative roll to determine the turn order.
To determine initiative, half of the Dexterity bonus is added to the Dexterity bonus and a d10 die roll is made.
The initiative order is determined separately for player characters and separately for enemies, and then turn sequences are determined within each of these groups.
The two sequences are then merged, allocating enemies and player characters according to a predetermined algorithm.

languages.text: 各戦闘開始時に、戦闘にいる全てのキャラクターは味方グループと敵グループに分けられて、各グループは2～4体のキャラクターで構成される。味方グループのターンと敵グループの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が交互に行われる。キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}イニシアチブ{/g}によって、味方または敵のどのグループに割り当てられるかが決まる。キャラクターのイニシアチブが高いほど、イニシアチブトラッカーの開始に近いグループに割り当てられる可能性が高くなり、戦闘で最初に行動できる。最初に行動するのは、平均イニシアチブ（総イニシアチブ数をグループにいるキャラクターの数で割ったもの）が一番高いグループ。 イニシアチブは次の式を使用して計算される：({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}ボーナス / 2 + (1〜10))
languages.original_text: At the start of each battle, all characters in combat are separated into allied and enemy groups with 2 to 4 characters in each. An allied group's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} alternates with an enemy group's turn. A character's {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} determines which group of allies or enemies they are assigned to. The higher a character's initiative, the higher the chances of being added to a group that is closer to the start of the initiative tracker, therefore allowing them to act first in combat. The first to act is the group whose average initiative (total initiative divided by the number of characters in the group) is the highest. Initiative is calculated using the following formula: ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus / 2 + (from 1 to 10))

traits.locale_text:
各戦闘の開始時に、戦闘中の全てのキャラクターはイニシアチブロールを行い、各々の行動を取る順番を決定する。
イニシアチブはキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}ボーナスの半分、およびランダムで選ばれる1から10の整数の合計で計算する。
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の順番は、まず最初にプレイヤーの順番を決定し、パーティーメンバーの順番を決めた後に敵の順番を決定する。
これら2つの順番は予め設定されたアルゴリズムを使用して組み合わされる。

languages.text: Her çatışmanın başında, çatışmadaki tüm karakterler her birinde 2 ila 4 karakter bulunan dost ve düşman gruplarına ayrılırlar. Bir dost grubun {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} bittiğinde sıra bir düşman grubunun turuna gelir. Bir karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}öncelik{/g} değeri, onun hangi dost veya düşman grubuna atanacağını belirler. Karakterin öncelik değeri ne kadar yüksekse öncelik izleyicisinin başlangıcına daha yakın bir gruba eklenme olasılığı da o kadar yükselir. Bu da çatışmada daha erken eylem yapabilmesine olanak tanır. İlk eyleme geçecek grup, ortalama öncelik değeri (toplam öncelik değerinin gruptaki karakter sayısına bölünmüş hâli) en yüksek olandır. Öncelik, şu formül kullanılarak hesaplanır: ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} bonusu / 2 + (1 ila 10))
languages.original_text: At the start of each battle, all characters in combat are separated into allied and enemy groups with 2 to 4 characters in each. An allied group's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} alternates with an enemy group's turn. A character's {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} determines which group of allies or enemies they are assigned to. The higher a character's initiative, the higher the chances of being added to a group that is closer to the start of the initiative tracker, therefore allowing them to act first in combat. The first to act is the group whose average initiative (total initiative divided by the number of characters in the group) is the highest.
